Package underlay

Class underlay

java.lang.Object
underlay.underlay
Direct Known Subclasses:
JavaRMIUnderlay, LocalUnderlay, TCPUnderlay, UDPUnderlay
public abstract class underlay
extends java.lang.Object
Represents the underlay layer of the simulator

      public final boolean initialize​(int port, MiddleLayer middleLayer)

      Returns:

    • sendMessage

      public abstract boolean sendMessage​(java.lang.String address, int port, Request request)
      Can be used to send a request to a remote server that runs the same underlay architecture.
      Parameters:
      address - address of the remote server.
      port - port of the remote server.
      request - the request.
      Returns:
      True in case of success, False otherwise
